languages.text: В описании найденных механизмов Ирлиэт узнает орудия старинных врагов — некронов, уже ставших частью мифологии ее народа. Эта вражда слишком стара, чтобы по-настоящему тревожить эльдарку, но на ее лице проскальзывает старинное, впитавшееся в саму кровь презрение.

traits.locale_text: Ирлиэт внимательно всматривается в нестабильную картину разрушенного производства. Рейнджер полагает, что своеобразное мерцание — результат поломки в устройствах пространственно-фазового регулирования. Пытаться постигнуть природу этой технологии — верный путь к гибели.

languages.text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.
languages.original_text: В описании найденных механизмов Ирлиэт узнает орудия старинных врагов — некронов, уже ставших частью мифологии ее народа. Эта вражда слишком стара, чтобы по-настоящему тревожить эльдарку, но на ее лице проскальзывает старинное, впитавшееся в саму кровь презрение.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet recognizes the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the found mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

languages.text: 根据曾经的描述，伊莉耶特辨认出这些装置是某种武器，出自艾达灵族的死对头——太空死灵之手。太空死灵如今已经化为了艾达灵族神话故事的一部分。由于它们的存在过于久远，伊莉耶特并没有感到恐惧。相反，烙入她血脉的古老传承，让她脸上掠过了带有轻蔑意味的阴影。
languages.original_text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

traits.locale_text: 根据曾经的描述，伊莉耶特辨认出这些装置是某种武器，出自艾达灵族的死对头——太空死灵之手。太空死灵如今已经化为了艾达灵族神话故事的一部分。由于它们的存在过于久远，伊莉耶特并没有感到恐惧。相反，烙入她血脉的古老传承，让她脸上掠过了带有轻蔑意味的阴影。

languages.text: ユリエットは発見されたメカニズムの種類から、それが古い敵であり今や彼女の民の神話の一部であるネクロンの武器であることに気づく。この敵はアエルダリを怯えさせるにはあまりに古すぎるが、彼女の顔には、その血に焼きつけられた古い恥辱の影が浮かんでいる。
languages.original_text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは発見されたメカニズムの種類から、それが古い敵であり今や彼女の民の神話の一部であるネクロンの武器であることに気づく。この敵はアエルダリを怯えさせるにはあまりに古すぎるが、彼女の顔には、その血に焼きつけられた古い恥辱の影が浮かんでいる。

languages.text: Yrliet reconoce el armamento de un viejo enemigo en las descripciones de los mecanismos descubiertos: los Necrones, que ahora forman parte de la mitología de su pueblo. Este enemigo es demasiado antiguo para asustar de verdad a la Aeldari, pero la sombra de un antiguo odio, grabado a fuego en su propia sangre, cruza su rostro.
languages.original_text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet reconoce el armamento de un viejo enemigo en las descripciones de los mecanismos descubiertos: los Necrones, que ahora forman parte de la mitología de su pueblo. Este enemigo es demasiado antiguo para asustar de verdad a la Aeldari, pero la sombra de un antiguo odio, grabado a fuego en su propia sangre, cruza su rostro.

languages.text: Yrliet erkennt in der Beschreibung der entdeckten Mechanismen die Waffen eines alten Feindes — der Necrons, die inzwischen Teil der Mythologie ihres Volks sind. Dieser Feind ist zu alt, um der Aeldari wirklich Angst zu machen. Über ihr Gesicht huscht jedoch der Schatten einer uralten Verachtung, die ihr ins Blut eingebrannt ist.
languages.original_text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet erkennt in der Beschreibung der entdeckten Mechanismen die Waffen eines alten Feindes — der Necrons, die inzwischen Teil der Mythologie ihres Volks sind. Dieser Feind ist zu alt, um der Aeldari wirklich Angst zu machen. Über ihr Gesicht huscht jedoch der Schatten einer uralten Verachtung, die ihr ins Blut eingebrannt ist.

languages.text: Yrliet reconnaît dans la description des engins l'arsenal d'un ennemi de longue date, les Nécrons, qui font désormais partie de la mythologie de son peuple. Si cet adversaire est trop ancien pour effrayer l'Aeldari, l'ombre fugace d'une haine ressurgie du fond des âges et gravée au fer rouge dans le sang de sa lignée voile son visage l'espace d'un instant.
languages.original_text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet reconnaît dans la description des engins l'arsenal d'un ennemi de longue date, les Nécrons, qui font désormais partie de la mythologie de son peuple. Si cet adversaire est trop ancien pour effrayer l'Aeldari, l'ombre fugace d'une haine ressurgie du fond des âges et gravée au fer rouge dans le sang de sa lignée voile son visage l'espace d'un instant.

languages.text: Keşfedilen mekanizmaların tasvirini duyan Yrliet, artık halkının efsanelerinde yer edinmiş eski bir düşmanları olan Nekronların silahları olduğunu fark ediyor. Bu düşman Aeldari'yi gerçekten korkutamayacak kadar eski olsa da, damarlarında akan kana kazınmış kadim bir nefretin gölgesi yüzünden okunuyor.
languages.original_text: Yrliet recognises the weaponry of an old foe in the descriptions of the discovered mechanisms — Necrons, now a part of the mythology of her people. This enemy is too old to truly frighten the Aeldari, but the shadow of an ancient contempt, burned into her very blood, passes across her face.
